statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT student_id, resource_type, relevance_score FROM recommendations;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, resource_type FROM recommendations;
SELECT resource_id, resource_type FROM recommendations ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 123 AND resource_type = 'book';
SELECT student_id, resource_id, resource_type, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_id, SUM(relevance_score) AS total_score FROM recommendations GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_score > 50
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS unique_students FROM recommendations WHERE resource_type = 'book'
SELECT resource_id, AVG(relevance_score) AS average_score FROM recommendations GROUP BY resource_id ORDER BY average_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_id, resource_id, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 0.8
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, birthdate FROM students WHERE birthdate > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video' ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, views_count FROM learning_resources WHERE views_count > 1000 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE views_count > 1000 ORDER BY views_count DESC, resource_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type LIKE '%video%' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Recommendations ON Students.student_id = Recommendations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Recommendations.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE LENGTH(course_description) > 50;
SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Recommendations ON Students.student_id = Recommendations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Recommendations.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE student_id = 100 AND course_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students
SELECT course_name FROM courses
SELECT resource_name, course_id FROM resources
SELECT student_id, resource_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT courses.course_name, resources.resource_name FROM courses JOIN resources ON courses.course_id = resources.course_id;
SELECT student_name, recommendation_score FROM students JOIN recommendations ON students.student_id = recommendations.student_id WHERE recommendation_score > 80;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM recommendations;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, resource_name FROM students INNER JOIN student_preferences ON students.student_id = student_preferences.student_id INNER JOIN resources ON student_preferences.resource_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id;
SELECT course_name, count(enrollment_id) as total_enrollments FROM courses JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name;

SELECT student_name, preference_score, resource_name FROM student_preferences JOIN students ON students.student_id = student_preferences.student_id JOIN resources ON resources.resource_id = student_preferences.resource_id ORDER BY preference_score DESC, student_name ASC;
